recipesJson.name: French Audio Porn for Echodub (Apricot Custard Pastry)
recipesJson.author: QueerYourVape
recipesJson.description:
Today on SaturDIY'ing with fresh03 and Friends! We are doing a Wishing Well: Doctors Without Borders! Echodub asked me for an apricot pastry and here in France, we have one called Oranais which is a beautiful fluffy pastry with a bed of crème pâtissière and gorgeous apricot with a sweet glaze and powdered sugar.

FA Armenia/FLV Persimmon = the beautiful apricot that is yellow and sweet.

FA Custard Premium/Vanilla Ice Cream/FLV Vanilla pudding/CAP French Vanilla = It's fresh's quick custard a little tweaked to be a little eggier and with hat good spicy vanilla.

WF Croissant/WF Caramel Butter = The french viennoiserie fluffy pastry with a little brown baked goodness on top.

I hope you enjoy Echo, and everybody else!

Be queer and vape on,

C. aka Queer Your Vape

[Photo credits: grands moulins de Paris]

reviews.text: thanks Cecile! update: after vaping this for some hours i really like it. persimmon was a good idea. i really look forward when this steeped a few days, but it's a very nice recipe
